usage: bnsyn [-h] {demo,run,dtcheck,sleep-stack} ...

BN-Syn CLI

positional arguments:
  {demo,run,dtcheck,sleep-stack}
    demo                Run a small deterministic demo simulation
    run                 Run experiment from YAML config
    dtcheck             Run dt vs dt/2 invariance harness
    sleep-stack         Run sleep-stack demo with emergence tracking

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
